Here is a list of all documented files with brief descriptions:
src/averagevectormagnitude/averagevectormagnitude.cxxCalculate the average magnitude of the vectors in a vector image
src/binaryimageoperator/binaryimageoperator.cxxApply a binary operator to a pair of images
src/binarythinning/binarythinning.cxxCompute binary thinning of an image
src/braindistance/braindistance.cxxThis program computes the distance between brains, based on a label mask image of one of the brains and a deformation field
src/castconvert/castconvert.cxxThis program converts and possibly casts images
src/closestversor3Dtransform/closestversor3Dtransform.cxxCalculates the closest rigid transform (VersorRigid3D) between two sets of landmarks. The two sets should be of equal size
src/combinesegmentations/combinesegmentations.cxxThis program combines multiple segmentations into one
src/computeboundingbox/computeboundingbox.cxxCompute the bounding box of an image
src/computedifferenceimageBIG/computeDifferenceImage.cxxCompute the difference image between two images
src/computemean/computemean.cxxCompute the mean of an image
src/computeoverlap/computeoverlap.cxxCompute the overlap of two images
src/contrastenhanceimage/contrastenhanceimage.cxxEnhance the contrast of an image
src/countnonzerovoxels/countnonzerovoxels.cxxCount non-zero voxels in an image
src/createbox/createbox.cxxCreate a box image
src/createcylinder/createcylinder.cxxCreate a cylinder image

src/createzeroimage/createzeroimage.cxxCreate a blank image
src/cropimage/cropimage.cxxCrop an image
src/deformationfieldgenerator/deformationfieldgenerator.cxxThis program generates a deformation field (from fixed to moving image) based on some corresponding points
src/deformationfieldoperator/deformationfieldoperator.cxxThis program converts between deformations (displacement fields) and transformations, and computes the magnitude or Jacobian of a deformation field
src/distancetransform/distancetransform.cxxThis program creates a signed distance transform
src/extracteveryotherslice/extracteveryotherslice.cxxExtract every other slice of an image
src/extractindexfromvectorimage/extractindexfromvectorimage.cxxThis program extracts a user specified component from a vector image
src/extractslice/extractslice.cxxExtracts a 2D slice from a 3D image
src/fftimage/fftimage.cxxCompute the FFT of an image. Note this documentation may be empty if ITKTools was compiled without USE_FFTIMAGE
src/gaussianimagefilter/gaussianimagefilter.cxxPerform a Gaussian filtering on an image
src/getdicominformation/getdicominformation.cxxTakes a directory and searches for dicom files, from which patient and study information is extracted
src/getDICOMseriesUIDs/getDICOMseriesUIDs.cxxTakes a directory and searches for dicom files, from which the seriesUID's are extracted
src/getimageinformation/getimageinformation.cxxPrint information about the input image to screen
src/histogramequalizeimage/histogramequalizeimage.cxxEqualize the histogram of an image
src/imagecompare/ImageCompare.cxxCompare two images
src/imagestovectorimage/imagestovectorimage.cxxStack images into one big vector image
src/intensityreplace/intensityreplace.cxxThis program replaces some user specified intensity values in an image
src/intensitywindowing/intensitywindowing.cxxIntensity windowing
src/invertintensityimagefilter/invertintensityimagefilter.cxxThis program inverts the intensities of an image. new = max - old (where max is the maximum of the image)
src/kappastatistic/kappastatistic.cxxCompute a kappa statistic
src/logicalimageoperator/logicalimageoperator.cxxPerform a logical operation on an image
src/morphology/morphology.cxxPerform a morphological operation on an image
src/naryimageoperator/naryimageoperator.cxxN-ary image operator
src/pca/pca.cxxPerform PCA
src/reflect/reflect.cxxThis program reflects an image
src/replacevoxel/replacevoxel.cxxThis program replaces the value of a user specified voxel
src/rescaleintensityimagefilter/rescaleintensityimagefilter.cxxRescale the intensities of an image
src/reshape/reshape.cxxReshape an image
src/resizeimage/resizeimage.cxxResize an image
src/segmentationdistance/segmentationdistance.cxxThis program computes a spatial segmentation error map
src/statisticsonimage/statisticsonimage.cxxCompute statistics on an image. For vector images, the magnitude is used
src/texture/texture.cxxThis program computes texture features based on the gray-level co-occurrence matrix (GLCM)
src/thresholdimage/thresholdimage.cxxThreshold an image
src/tileimages/tileimages.cxxEither tiles a stack of 2D images into a 3D image, or tiles nD images to form another nD image
src/ttest/ttest.cxxPerform T-test
src/unaryimageoperator/unaryimageoperator.cxxUnary operations on an image
